term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - hydrogen gas electrode
term.title: hydrogen gas electrode

item.text: A thin foil of platinum electrolytically coated with a finely divided deposit of platinum or palladium metal, which catalyses the electrode reaction: in solutions saturated with hydrogen gas.

sources.item: PAC, 1985, 57, 531. 'Definition of pH scales, standard reference values, measurement of pH and related terminology (Recommendations 1984)' on page 540 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198557030531)
